name: Office Care
description:
Office Care is a tomogotchi like reminder idle game.

Choose your good habits you want to be reminded about and start your day. 

Office Care is meant to be played over the course of a work day. Obviously for testing and for quick reviews waiting an hour is a bit much to ask and so hyper mode cuts this down to seconds. 

Our hope is that  by personifiying our office worker we are reminded ourselves to take heed of the time we spend at work. Coded by David Byrne , Art by Luke Byrne.
